description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up routes, themes, and state management with RoleProvider, for the Healthy Meals app.

classes.name: RoleProvider
classes.description: An InheritedNotifier that provides RoleNotifier to descendant widgets, enabling role-based context sharing.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter app, responsible for theme, routing, and role initialization.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the Flutter app with role provider and routing.

methods.name: RoleProvider.of
methods.description: A static method to retrieve the current RoleNotifier from the widget tree context.

methods.name: MyApp.build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget, initializing auth, setting routes, and wrapping with RoleProvider.
